bibl.title: Song, Performance, and Text in the New Posidippus.
bibl.note: 49: The silence of Hegedike (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309, col. viii, 7-12). - 51: Laments and flowers for the dead (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309, col. viii, 19-24). - 51: Choreography and Genre. - 62.1-2: Time and the artist (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309, col. x, 8-9). - Bibliography.
